LanguageData.PsychicShock.label: mana shock
LanguageData.PsychicShock.description: A state of mana-induced chaos in the brain and mind. Caused by magical attacks or critical level of arcane load, this effect is debilitating until it wears off.
LanguageData.PsychicComa.label: mana exhaustion coma
LanguageData.PsychicComa.description: A form of benign coma during which the brain recovers from an arcane overload.
LanguageData.PsychicHangover.label: mana hangover
LanguageData.PsychicHangover.description: An after-effect of excessive arcane load. Mana hangovers are bothersome, but not dangerous.
